Nazeebo.name: Corpse Spiders
Nazeebo.description: Hurl a jar of spiders that deals 50 (+4% per level) damage. If it hits at least one enemy, create 3 Corpse Spiders that attack for 35 (+4% per level) damage. Spiders last for 4 seconds.

Nazeebo.name: Zombie Wall
Nazeebo.description: After 1 second, create a ring of Zombies surrounding the target area that deal 28 (+4% per level) damage and last for 3 seconds.

Nazeebo.name: Plague of Toads
Nazeebo.description: Create a wave of 3 Toads that explode on contact, dealing 140 (+4% per level) damage over 6 seconds. This effect stacks.

Nazeebo.name: Gargantuan
Nazeebo.description: Summon a Gargantuan to guard an area for 20 seconds. Deals 100 (+4% per level) damage when summoned, attacks for 150 (+4% per level) damage, and can be ordered to stomp nearby enemies.

Nazeebo.name: Ravenous Spirit
Nazeebo.description: Channel a Ravenous Spirit that deals 206 (+4% per level) damage per second. Cannot move while channeling. Lasts for 8 seconds.

Nazeebo.name: Voodoo Ritual
Nazeebo.description: Your Basic Attacks and Abilities poison Non-Heroic enemies, causing them to take 66 (+4% per level) additional damage over 6 seconds.  If a Minion dies while poisoned by Voodoo Ritual, you permanently gain 4 Health and 1 Mana.

1.name: Pandemic
1.description: Reward: After hitting 40 Heroes with Plague of Toads, it spawns 2 additional toads.

1.name: Thing of the Deep
1.description: Increases the range of Nazeebo's Basic Abilities by 20%.

1.name: Widowmakers
1.description: Reward: After Corpse Spiders attack Heroes 100 times, their attack damage is increased by 30%.

4.name: Big Voodoo
4.description: Increases the Health and Mana bonuses from Voodoo Ritual by 100%.

4.name: Blood Ritual
4.description: If an enemy dies while poisoned by Voodoo Ritual, restore 1.95% of Nazeebo's maximum Health and Mana.

4.name: Hexed Crawlers
4.description: Corpse spiders restore 0.75% of Nazeebo's maximum Health and Mana when they attack an enemy Hero.

7.name: Dead Rush
7.description: Zombie Wall deals 75% more damage. When it expires up to 5 remaining Zombies uproot and attack nearby enemies for 3 seconds.

7.name: Spirit of Arachyr
7.description: If Corpse Spiders hits only one enemy, it creates 2 additional spiders.

7.name: Toads of Hugeness
7.description: Increase the damage and explosion radius of Plague of Toads by 25% after each hop, up to a maximum of 100%.

10.name: Gargantuan
10.description: Summon a Gargantuan to guard an area for 20 seconds. Deals 100 (+4% per level) damage when summoned, attacks for 150 (+4% per level) damage, and can be ordered to stomp nearby enemies.

10.name: Ravenous Spirit
10.description: Channel a Ravenous Spirit that deals 206 (+4% per level) damage per second. Cannot move while channeling. Lasts for 8 seconds.

13.name: Guardian Toads
13.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Plague of Toads gives 25 Armor for 2 seconds, reducing damage taken by 25%.

13.name: Ice Block
13.description: Activate to place yourself in Stasis and gain Invulnerability for 3 seconds.

13.name: Superstition
13.description: Gain 40 Spell Armor, taking 40% less damage from Abilities, but lose 30 Physical Armor, taking 30% more damage from Basic Attacks.

16.name: Ring of Poison
16.description: Zombie Wall lasts 1 second longer, and the center is filled with poison that deals a total of 318.75 (+4% per level) damage over 4 seconds. This damage starts small and increases over the duration.

16.name: Soul Harvest
16.description: Activate to increase Nazeebo's Health and Ability Power by 7% for each nearby enemy, up to a maximum of 35%. Lasts 15 seconds.

16.name: Spider Colony
16.description: Corpse Spiders' cooldown recharges 100% faster while above 850 Health.

20.name: Annihilating Spirit
20.description: Increases the range of Ravenous Spirit by 50% and Movement Speed by 30%.

20.name: Fury of the Storm
20.description: Every 5 seconds, your next Basic Attack will deal an additional 91 (+4% per level) damage to the target, and 228 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters.

20.name: Humongoid
20.description: Reduce Gargantuan's cooldown by 40 seconds and its Mana cost by 50%.

20.name: Vile Infection
20.description: Reward: After reaching 175 stacks of Voodoo Ritual, it can also be applied to Heroes and its damage is increased by 200%.
